algorithm_technique: Iterate through arrays, maintaining global min and max, calculating max difference
problem_summary_simple: Find the largest absolute difference between numbers from two different sorted arrays.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through sorted arrays, tracking global min/max to find max difference between current array's ends and global extremes.
key_insights: The maximum distance will always involve the overall minimum and overall maximum values across all arrays.
We only need to track the minimum and maximum values encountered so far to efficiently calculate potential maximum distances.
